verses.name: 1 Samuel 2:25
verses.text: If one man sin against another, the judge shall judge him: but if a man sin against the Lord, who shall intreat for him? Notwithstanding they hearkened not unto the voice of their father, because the Lord would slay them.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 2:26
verses.text: And the child Samuel grew on, and was in favour both with the Lord, and also with men.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 2:27
verses.text: And there came a man of God unto Eli, and said unto him, Thus saith the Lord, Did I plainly appear unto the house of thy father, when they were in Egypt in Pharaoh’s house?
